author: Rebecca Klar
title: New Jersey governor: 'We're fighting to stay ahead' on bed capacity, ventilators, PPE
description: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) said Sunday his state is trying to stay ahead of the need for hospital beds and equipment as it grapples with the coronavirus pandemic. "We're fighting to stay ahe...
content:
New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) said Sunday his state is trying to stay ahead of the need for hospital beds and equipment as it grapples with the coronavirus pandemic. 
We're fighting to stay ahead on bed capacity, ventilators that are constantly running thi… [+1576 chars]
